tweet.text: Who says bureaucrats don’t have a sense of humor? Likely an April Fool’s memo, this #FavoriteFRUS assesses Gorbachev as having “razor blades on his elbows,” and references Jane Fonda, King Tut, Luca Brazzi, and whale blubber all in one hilarious document! https://t.co/GONaaLrQ4r https://t.co/55NjegVTfu
